title: Another Trend Zeits The Dust 3/2: State of the Union, Bullet Train, Target, Girl Scouts, Ron DeSantis, Nitro Pepsi, Coca Cola Starlight
itunes:title: Another Trend Zeits The Dust 3/2: State of the Union, Bullet Train, Target, Girl Scouts, Ron DeSantis, Nitro Pepsi, Coca Cola Starlight
description:
In this edition of Another Trend Zeits The Dust, Jack and Miles discuss the State of the Union address, the 'Bullet Train' trailer, Target raising employee wages, Girl Scouts being harrassed, Ron DeSantis telling Tampa high school students masks are "COVID theater", and Nitro Pepsi v. Coca Cola Starlight!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
